content:
@Jamie Jones while avoiding discussion in announcement streams:

Is there any new documentation for the template? I may have some time to help port us over if I can get pointed in the right direction

what are you looking for?

Thanks, didn't see I had reselected the announce stream there :sweat_smile:
CG is looking at transferring our published IG to use the new templates for future updates. @Lloyd McKenzie mentioned there wasn't much documentation for doing so yet

@Jamie Jones -- if you're not aware of it already, I think this is the best documentation currently available: https://build.fhir.org/ig/FHIR/ig-guidance/index.html

It also helps to look at the sample IG: http://github.com/FHIR/sample-ig
